body:
The C api method is named TF_OperationOutputConsumers and returns a TF_Input. But TF_OperationInput takes in an Input and returns an output.

I renamed it to be Consumers() to go from Output to Input, and Producer() to go from Input to Output.

```go
var op *Operation
op.Output(0).Consumers()
op.Input(0).Producer()
```
body_html:
The C api method is named TF_OperationOutputConsumers and returns a TF_Input. But TF_OperationInput takes in an Input and returns an output.

I renamed it to be Consumers() to go from Output to Input, and Producer() to go from Input to Output.

var op *Operation
op.Output(0).Consumers()
op.Input(0).Producer()
